# 推荐系统之算法（Librec 中文文档）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/tuijian-xitong-zhi-suanfa-librec-zhongwen-wendang
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/tuijian-xitong-zhi-suanfa-librec-zhongwen-wendang
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install tuijian-xitong-zhi-suanfa-librec-zhongwen-wendang
tuijian-xitong-zhi-suanfa-librec-zhongwen-wendang <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g tuijian-xitong-zhi-suanfa-librec-zhongwen-wendang
tuijian-xitong-zhi-suanfa-librec-zhongwen-wendang <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
